query:
UPDATE shift_slots
        SET shift_template_id = COALESCE($2, shift_template_id),
            classification_id = COALESCE($3, classification_id),
            days_of_week      = COALESCE($4, days_of_week),
            label             = COALESCE($5, label),
            is_active         = COALESCE($6, is_active)
        WHERE id = $1
